cast.name: 欧嘉·布赖尔斯 Olga Bisera

writer.name: 皮尔·卢多维科·帕沃尼 Pier Ludovico Pavoni

introduction: Description: Starring Laura Gemser, who also played in Emmanuelle in America movie. The Italian engineer Francesco Ferrero arrive on a beautiful tropical island of La Esmeralda, to explore the possibility of the opening of the silver mine. Hardly having appeared at the place, he immediately falls in love with a beautiful aborigen Janine. Fortunately, that manners on the island reign highly available. It would seem - live and be happy! Here only with the work of the matter as something went wrong - the tools of the disappeared, is broken, communication with the mainland was extremely unreliable, and the assistants everything matching armless klutz. Yes and mysterious rituals islanders, which reluctantly told the local priest, too, does not inspire confidence. Moreover, Janine it always is at the center of these strange ceremonies.
